terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.subtitle: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using our services.
terms.introduction: Welcome to Rabet Al-Khayal. These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of our website and services. By accessing this website, we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use our website if you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content:
By accessing and using our services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

These terms apply to all visitors, users, and others who access or use our service. We reserve the right to update and change the Terms of Service from time to time without notice.

services.title: Description of Services
services.content:
Rabet Al-Khayal provides digital services including but not limited to web development, design, consultation, and digital products through our platform.

We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of our service at any time. We may also impose limits on certain features or restrict access to parts or all of the service without notice or liability.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content:
When you create an account with us, you must provide information that is accurate, complete, and current at all times. You are responsible for safeguarding the password and for keeping your account information up to date.

You agree not to disclose your password to any third party and to take sole responsibility for activities that occur under your account.

orders.title: Orders and Payments
orders.content:
All orders are subject to acceptance and availability. We reserve the right to refuse any order at our discretion. Prices are subject to change without notice.

Payment must be received in full before we begin work on your order. We accept various payment methods as displayed during checkout.

shipping.title: Shipping and Delivery
shipping.content:
Delivery times are estimates and may vary depending on location and product type. We are not responsible for delays caused by customs, weather, or other factors beyond our control.

Risk of loss and title for physical products pass to you upon delivery to the carrier.

returns.title: Returns and Refunds
returns.content:
Digital products are generally non-refundable due to their nature. Physical products may be returned within 30 days of delivery in their original condition.

Refunds will be processed within 5-10 business days of approval and will be credited to the original payment method.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.content:
In no event shall Rabet Al-Khayal be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of your use of our services.

Our total liability shall not exceed the amount paid by you for the specific service or product that gave rise to the claim.

hero.title: About Rabet Al-Khayal
hero.subtitle: We are a leading digital innovation company dedicated to transforming ideas into reality through cutting-edge technology and creative excellence.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To bridge the gap between imagination and reality by providing innovative digital solutions that empower businesses and individuals to achieve their goals in the digital age.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading force in digital transformation across the Middle East, setting new standards for creativity, innovation, and customer satisfaction in the digital services industry.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Rabet Al-Khayal's journey began with a clear vision to bridge the gap between imagination and reality through cutting-edge technology and innovative creative solutions.
story.paragraph2: Over the years, we have evolved from a small startup to a leading platform in the region, serving thousands of clients and executing hundreds of successful projects.
story.paragraph3: We are proud of our achievements and look forward to the future with confidence, continuing to provide the best technical and creative solutions for our clients.

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace new technologies and creative approaches to solve complex challenges and drive digital transformation.

passion.title: Passion
passion.description: We are passionate about what we do and dedicate ourselves to delivering the best results for our clients.

quality.title: Quality Excellence
quality.description: We deliver exceptional quality in every project, ensuring our clients receive solutions that exceed expectations.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in everything we do, from design to implementation and delivery.

founding.title: Company Founded
founding.description: Started with a vision to revolutionize digital services in the region

growth.title: Rapid Growth
growth.description: Expanded operations to serve clients across the Middle East

expansion.title: Regional Expansion
expansion.description: Received multiple awards for innovation and customer satisfaction

innovation.title: Innovation Hub
innovation.description: Launched our innovation center focusing on emerging technologies

present.title: Present & Future
present.description: Reached 10,000+ satisfied customers and 500+ successful projects

team.title: Our Team
team.subtitle: We come together to provide the best technical and creative solutions for our clients

chairman.name: Mohammed Al-Mutairi
chairman.content:
Welcome as Chairman of the Board of Rabet Al-Khayal Company. I consider myself a consultant in human resources and a business leader, working with focus and passion to help and support individuals and institutions in both government and private sectors to achieve their goals by fully utilizing their potential and providing innovative solutions in training, self-development, and competency enhancement.

I have been and continue to be interested in how to invest the potential of individuals and institutions to achieve the highest results, as there is nothing worse than seeing wasted potential. Therefore, we have taken it upon ourselves to provide solutions for developing human competencies to help individuals, leaders, and institutions achieve their full potential. With the launch of Saudi Vision 2030, we felt the importance of investing our team's capabilities to support human resource development in the Kingdom through innovative solutions that combine the best modern global practices with a deep understanding of national development requirements to achieve the highest level of progress.

generalManager.name: Mohanad Hamad
generalManager.content: It started as a dream, then it came true and became a reality, thanks to God Almighty, and through the efforts of sincere people working at Rabet Al-Khayal Agency. We overcame difficulties and achieved success after success until we reached the forefront of elite companies in the Kingdom. We spared no effort to maintain our position at the forefront, and in light of the great economic growth and civilizational renaissance that the Kingdom is witnessing and its distinguished geographical location, the Kingdom has aligned with economic movements through modern and advanced methods that helped attract investors and increase economic activity in the country. Therefore, we were keen on continuous development to raise the company's efficiency with strategic policies and plans through which we aspire to contribute effectively to enriching our society and gaining our clients' trust by establishing principles of honesty, professionalism, and commitment.

contact.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
contact.subtitle: Let's work together to transform your ideas into digital reality. Contact us today to discuss your project.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.subtitle: Learn how we use cookies to improve your experience on our website and how you can manage your preferences.

whatAreCookies.title: What are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better browsing experience by remembering your preferences and improving site functionality.
whatAreCookies.details: These files contain information that is transferred to your device's hard drive and allow our website to recognize your device and remember certain information about your visit.

performance.title: Website Performance
performance.description: Monitor site performance and user interactions

analytics.title: Analytics & Insights
analytics.description: Understand how visitors use our website

managePreferences.title: Manage Your Cookie Preferences
managePreferences.description: You can control which cookies you allow by adjusting the settings below or through your browser settings.

browserSettings.title: Browser Settings

browserSettings.edge: Edge: Settings > Privacy, search, and services

managePreferences.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes to your cookie preferences.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting and reporting information anonymously.
analytics.examples: Google Analytics, page views, user behavior

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements and marketing campaigns.

personalization.title: Personalization Cookies
personalization.description: These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization based on your interactions.
personalization.examples: Language preferences, theme settings, user interface

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Learn how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our services.
privacy.introduction: At Rabet Al-Khayal, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services. Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the site.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content:
This Privacy Policy describes how Rabet Al-Khayal collects, uses, and shares information about you when you use our website, mobile applications, and services. We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring that your personal information is handled responsibly and in accordance with applicable data protection laws.

By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content:
We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, make a purchase, or contact us for support.

Personal Information:
‚Ä¢ Name and contact information (email address, phone number)
‚Ä¢ Billing and shipping addresses
‚Ä¢ Payment information (processed securely through third-party providers)
‚Ä¢ Account credentials and preferences
‚Ä¢ Communication preferences

Usage Information:
‚Ä¢ Website usage data and analytics
‚Ä¢ Device information and browser type
‚Ä¢ IP address and location data
‚Ä¢ Cookies and similar tracking technologies
‚Ä¢ Interaction with our services and content

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content:
We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services:

Service Delivery:
‚Ä¢ Process orders and transactions
‚Ä¢ Provide customer support and respond to inquiries
‚Ä¢ Deliver products and services
‚Ä¢ Manage your account and preferences

Communication:
‚Ä¢ Send important updates about your orders
‚Ä¢ Provide customer service and support
‚Ä¢ Send marketing communications (with your consent)
‚Ä¢ Notify you about changes to our services

Improvement and Analytics:
‚Ä¢ Analyze usage patterns and trends
‚Ä¢ Improve our website and services
‚Ä¢ Develop new features and products
‚Ä¢ Conduct research and analytics

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.content:
We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except in the following circumstances:

Service Providers:
‚Ä¢ Payment processors for transaction processing
‚Ä¢ Shipping companies for order delivery
‚Ä¢ Email service providers for communications
‚Ä¢ Analytics providers for website insights

Legal Requirements:
‚Ä¢ When required by law or legal process
‚Ä¢ To protect our rights and property
‚Ä¢ To prevent fraud or abuse
‚Ä¢ In case of emergency to protect user safety

Business Transfers:
‚Ä¢ In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets
‚Ä¢ With your explicit consent for other purposes

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content:
We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction:

Security Measures:
‚Ä¢ SSL encryption for data transmission
‚Ä¢ Secure servers and databases
‚Ä¢ Regular security audits and updates
‚Ä¢ Access controls and authentication
‚Ä¢ Employee training on data protection

Data Protection:
‚Ä¢ Limited access to personal information
‚Ä¢ Regular backup and recovery procedures
‚Ä¢ Incident response and breach notification
‚Ä¢ Compliance with industry standards

While we strive to protect your personal information, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee absolute security but are committed to maintaining the highest standards of data protection.

userRights.title: Your Rights and Choices
userRights.content:
You have certain rights regarding your personal information:

Access and Portability:
‚Ä¢ Request access to your personal information
‚Ä¢ Receive a copy of your data in a portable format
‚Ä¢ Update or correct your information

Control and Deletion:
‚Ä¢ Delete your account and associated data
‚Ä¢ Opt-out of marketing communications
‚Ä¢ Manage cookie preferences
‚Ä¢ Withdraw consent for data processing

Data Protection:
‚Ä¢ Object to certain processing activities
‚Ä¢ Request restriction of processing
‚Ä¢ File a complaint with supervisory authorities

To exercise these rights, please contact us using the information provided in the Contact section. We will respond to your request within a reasonable timeframe and in accordance with applicable law.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content:
We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website:

Types of Cookies:
‚Ä¢ Essential cookies for website functionality
‚Ä¢ Analytics cookies to understand usage patterns
‚Ä¢ Marketing cookies for personalized content
‚Ä¢ Preference cookies to remember your settings

Cookie Management:
‚Ä¢ You can control cookies through your browser settings
‚Ä¢ Disabling cookies may affect website functionality
‚Ä¢ We provide cookie preference controls on our website

For detailed information about our cookie usage, please refer to our Cookie Policy.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.content:
Our website may contain links to third-party websites and services:

Third-Party Integration:
‚Ä¢ Payment processors (Stripe, PayPal)
‚Ä¢ Analytics services (Google Analytics)
‚Ä¢ Social media platforms
‚Ä¢ Marketing and advertising partners

External Links:
‚Ä¢ We are not responsible for third-party privacy practices
‚Ä¢ Please review their privacy policies before providing information
‚Ä¢ We do not control third-party data collection

Third-Party Data Sharing:
‚Ä¢ We may share information with trusted service providers
‚Ä¢ These providers are bound by confidentiality agreements
‚Ä¢ We ensure they meet our data protection standards

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content:
We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this Privacy Policy:

Retention Periods:
‚Ä¢ Account information: Until account deletion
‚Ä¢ Transaction data: As required by law (typically 7 years)
‚Ä¢ Marketing data: Until consent is withdrawn
‚Ä¢ Analytics data: Aggregated and anonymized after 2 years

Data Deletion:
‚Ä¢ We will delete personal information upon request
‚Ä¢ Some data may be retained for legal compliance
‚Ä¢ Backup data is securely deleted according to schedule
‚Ä¢ Anonymized data may be retained for analytics

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content:
Our services are not intended for children under the age of 13:

Age Restrictions:
‚Ä¢ We do not knowingly collect information from children under 13
‚Ä¢ If we discover such collection, we will delete the information
‚Ä¢ Parents should monitor their children's online activities

Parental Rights:
‚Ä¢ Parents can request deletion of their child's information
‚Ä¢ We provide tools for parents to control data collection
‚Ä¢ We comply with applicable children's privacy laws

If you believe we have collected information from a child under 13, please contact us immediately.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content:
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time:

Policy Updates:
‚Ä¢ We will notify you of significant changes
‚Ä¢ Updates will be posted on this page with a new date
‚Ä¢ Continued use constitutes acceptance of changes

Notification Methods:
‚Ä¢ Email notification for material changes
‚Ä¢ Website banner for important updates
‚Ä¢ In-app notifications for mobile users

We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically to stay informed about how we protect your information.
